values.text: This Black History Month March Productive Activities Announcement

We chose this feature release email template from not for its beautiful design, rather for the simple message it conveys to its readers.


Although the email only presents two areas with text, the fusion the available space with text and visuals is used in a great way.

When it comes to a new feature release, the way of structuring your email will highly depend on your company’s tone of voice. A very big company, such as Microsoft.

This Black History Month March Productive Activities Announcement

We chose this feature release email template from not for its beautiful design, rather for the simple message it conveys to its readers.


Although the email only presents two areas with text, the fusion the available space with text and visuals is used in a great way.
